content: WOW! SPOT ON! Thank you so much, the best article! Pure gold. You have summed it all up perfectly — much better than I would ever have been able to. And I was positively choking with the need to speak up and tell it like it is. I stand 100% behind every single word you have said here. Thank you, thank you, thank you! You kinda took it off my chest, I needed this soooo much. Somebody had to say it and you did a wonderful job. I wish there was a stronger word than thank you, just for the way I feel about this article. I am sure many will agree as much as I do with what you have said . It was the high time somebody gave an articulate piece of mind to Ev about these developments on Medium. Thank you , one more time. ☺
